#### Fabric & Film Coating {#coat-indcom-fabric_film}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-fabric_film-setup}
FABRIC_FILM_CATEGORIES <- c(
  "#260 Fabric & Film Ctg." = 260,
  "#261 Fabric & Film C/U" = 261,
  "#1918 Fabric & Film Ctg. (Area)" = 1918,
  "#1919 Fabric & Film C/U (Area)" = 1919)
```

##### History {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-fabric_film-emission-chart}
BY2011_annual_emission_data %>%
  filter_categories(
    FABRIC_FILM_CATEGORIES) %>%
  chart_BY2011_annual_emissions_by(
    fill = category) 
```

##### Emission Factors (Area) {-}

```{r petprod-coat-indcom-fabric_film-annual_emfac-chart}

    color = category)
```
